subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Pat White, the West Virginia quarterback, passed for 95 yards and a touchdown and directed two scoring drives to lead the South to a 35-18 win over the North in the Senior Bowl on Saturday in Mobile, Ala. White, a native of nearby Daphne, was named the game’s most valuable player.
